awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Linear and Nonlinear Wave Motion
awd_abstract_narration: 8902387                                                                         Rauch                                                                                The principal investigator will study the qualitative                      behavior of solutions of hyperbolic partial differential                        equations.  These are the equations which govern the                            propagation of waves which can carry sharp signals.  Studies                    will be made of sharply peaked fronts and high frequency wave                   train solutions for nonlinear equations.  Another main area of                  research is the study of the control, observation, or                           stabilization of waves in a region.                                                  The understanding of the behavior of solutions of                          hyperbolic partial differential equations is important in many                  fields of application.
